import React from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import useHistory to navigate between pages import Header from '../../components/Header/Header'; // Import Header component import Footer from '../../components/Footer/Footer'; // Import Footer component import './UserDashboard.css'; const UserDashboard = () => { const history = useHistory(); // Initialize useHistory // Function to navigate to GenerateFrontElevation page const handleGenerateFrontElevation = () => { history.push('/generate-front-elevation'); // Navigate to the GenerateFrontElevation page }; return (

); }; export default UserDashboard;
